General.Name: Shindo Eng. Lab. Ltd
General.Description: Shindo Eng. Lab., Ltd. develops and delivers TFT LCD to LCD panel equipment manufacturing in South Korea. It develops and sells exposure M/C, assembly M/C, LC filling M/C, hot press, and other LCD equipment. The company also exports its products to Taipei, China, and Australia. Shindo Eng. Lab., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Siheung, South Korea.
